name: Firefox 4 Tabs In Titlebar w/ Appmenu As Tab
description:
Moves tabs into the title bar in a normal window and makes appmenu resemble a pinned tab. This absolutely will not work on a Mac.
If you only want the appmenu as a tab in maximised window use this instead: style 39724
 
Tested in Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110114 Firefox/4.0b10pre ID:20110114030359
